title: Scandal-hit Volkswagen hires Opel exec as strategy chief
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer - Today 
Volkswagen AG is hiring a top strategy executive from competitor Opel as it seeks to recover from a scandal over its cheating on U.S. diesel... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
